name: Ассистент/администратор в венчурный фонд
description:
Responsibilities:

S16VC is on the lookout for a Fund Admin

Fund Administrator at s16vc - a hands-on role for an empathetic & highly organized administrative professional.

• Mission:

• To help run day-to-day operations of a global venture fund;

• To help build & maintain processes of wow-quality for partners, global founders and LPs.

• Responsibilities:

Manage fund administration and provide assistance to the fund team across all functions, eg:

• Schedule calls and meetings;

• Take notes;

• Manage execution of documents (incl. review, amending, signing/signing before a notary, apostillation, filing) & handle information requests from various stakeholders;

• Maintain CRM systems;

• Communicate with a tax CPA to deliver tax/other compliance reporting;

• Liaise with an accounting team and fund administrator to keep accounting records and manage fund finances;

• Effect transfers / liaise with internal stakeholders to complete various transactions;

• Optimize repeated processes: detect inefficiencies, take them up, come up with ways to improve, execute;

• Analyse and structure information;

• Assist the fund team in a variety of ad-hoc tasks.

• Why you:

• High EQ & intrinsic motivation to help;

• Ability to work with little to no supervision. High ownership, excellent time management skills, proactive approach to problem-solving;

• Analytical skills. Good at processing and structuring info effectively and highlighting what is requested;

• Excellent command of English, especially written.

• Diligence. Desire to perform tasks with great care and love of detail;

• Willingness to absorb new knowledge, curiosity about learning new tools to augment work responsibilities;

• Persistence. Able to get things done despite obstacles;

• Background:

• We expect the candidates to have 5-6 years of experience in administrative/operations roles, preferably in a VC-funded company or a venture fund.

• Why us:

• Partners’ personalities. Partners are experienced founders and top-notch professionals in legal and private equity - it’s a unique opportunity to work side by side with and learn from them on a daily basis.

• Values. We value trust and transparency, EQ and intrinsic motivation to contribute to sth bigger than you are.

• You will be uniquely positioned to help build some of the fund‘s operations from scratch and learn by creating.

• Exposure to the community of portfolio founders and exceptional advisors. People who are changing the world and building technologies becoming household names worldwide.

• Terms:

• Full-time position;

• Remote work;

• Compensation: $2,000

​​
